name: Cube (itch) (Boreal Games)
description:
Cube is a puzzle/platform minimalistic game with a rotation mechanic, your logical thinking, dexterity and precision will be challenged, try to get the best score while pass through 49 levels with progressive dificulty.

Alert! If you don't like be challenged and are not ready to die a lot in this game don't even try it, it can be harder than it looks.
